title: Morning Joe 6/17/21
description: President Joe Biden and Russian President Vladimir Putin emerged from their meeting in Switzerland on Wednesday projecting optimism for future relations despite continued divisions on thorny topics from cyberattacks to human rights abuses.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
